FuncDef: The display bgp multicast update-peer-group command displays information about MBGP update peer-groups.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the index of an update peer-group.
The value is an integer ranging from 0 to 65535.

Examples: The Multicast instance's update peer group number : 1
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
If the index of an update peer-group is specified, the command will display detailed information about the specified update peer-group.
